name: MemeDao.Ai
description: MemeDao.AI is designed to make decisions based on the sentiments of the meme world and different meme communities through monitoring the movement of the MemeDao.AI token. This is all made possible through a combination of smart contracts, staking, voting, automated contract functions and AI bots all which feed into the MemeDao.AI ecosystem allowing it to make decisions to directly promote innovation and strong projects in the meme world. In doing so, MemeDao.AI is the only platform that unifies like-minded individuals from across top meme projects into a single community - all linked together through a central Artificial Intelligence. The ‘creators’ of MemeDao.AI have developed multiple supplementary AI’s to enhance the output of the MemeDao.AI ecosystem. These are powerful AI systems in and of themselves but when combined they create an intelligent ecosystem like no other before seen in the space.
